agent_utterance: Here's a simple, high-probability plan for this evening: 1) Hydrate with 500 ml of cold water or unsweetened iced tea to quench thirst and reduce cravings. 2) Choose a pre-portioned, cue-friendly snack: 1/2 cup fresh berries or a small slice of watermelon with a tablespoon of yogurt, or a few cucumber rounds with a light dip. 3) Do a 5-minute mindful check-in: name what you're feeling, rate your hunger, and set a tiny intention (e.g., eat slowly, pause before eating). 4) If cravings return after dinner, use the If-Then plan: "If cravings hit, I will take a 7-minute walk or drink a glass of water and wait 10 minutes." Stay cool and keep it simple tonight.
